error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, please try again

user.title: Connect to the device
user.description: Enter the serial (RS485) port that connects to the Sentio controller.

data_description.serial_port: On Linux systems - Use link from /dev/serial/by_id/ for increased stability.
data_description.heater_power: Set nominal power of the heater. 0 to disable power calculation.
